summary: "Papa", one of the chiefs of a tribe in the highlands, is taxi driver of a "Tinpis", a collective bush-taxi. Saved from an accident by Naaki, a young man from the city, he offers him his ... See full summary Â»
cast: Suzi Buri|Gerard Gabud|Leo Konga|Rhoda Selan|Stan Walker|Oscar Wanu
title: Tinpis Run
